name: get_device_info
description: Retrieve all information for a specified Home Assistant entity, such as a light or sensor, using its device ID.

device_id.description: The device ID (e.g., `LIGHT_001`) to retrieve state information for.

name: get_id_by_name
description: Retrieve the device ID for a given device name.

name: get_state
description: Retrieve the current on/off state of a specified Home Assistant entity (e.g., light, sensor) using its entity ID.

device_id.description: The device ID to retrieve state for (e.g., 'LIGHT_001').

name: list_devices
description: Retrieve all entities in Home Assistant, optionally filtered by domain.

domain.description: An optional domain to filter entities, such as `light`, `switch`, or `automation`; returns all entities if not specified.

name: set_device_property
description: Update Home Assistant device properties using a dictionary of new attribute values.

entity_id.description: The Home Assistant entity ID to update.

new_attributes.description: A dictionary of updatable device properties as key-value pairs, e.g., `{"state": "On", "brightness": 70}`.

name: toggle_device
description: Control a Home Assistant device's state: set a specific valid state, or cycle to the next allowed state if no state is provided. Valid states include 'On'/'Off' for electronics and 'Open'/'Closed' or 'Locked'/'Unlocked' for openable items.

state.description: The desired state to set; defaults to None, in which case the device cycles to its next allowed state.
